boosted_barrage.title: There are two different cards named "Boosted Barrage"!
boosted_barrage.desc:
Please specify which one you want by doing one of the following:

For Battle: `!fetch Boosted Barrage Battle`
For Negotiation: `!fetch Boosted Barrage Negotiation`

bully.title: There is both a card and a bane named "Bully"!
bully.desc:
Please specify which one you want by doing one of the following:

For the card: `!fetch Bully Card`
For the bane: `!fetch Bully Bane`

burnt_out_graft.title: There are two different grafts named "Burnt-out Graft"!
burnt_out_graft.desc:
Please specify which one you want by doing one of the following:

For Battle: `!fetch Burnt-out Graft Battle`
For Negotiation: `!fetch Burnt-out Graft Negotiation`
